docs.snippet: Griffith, a welterweight and middleweight champion, fought professionally for 20 years. He famously won a 1962 bout in which his opponent died 10 days later....
docs.lead_paragraph: Griffith, a welterweight and middleweight champion, fought professionally for 20 years. He famously won a 1962 bout in which his opponent died 10 days later.
docs.abstract: Emile Griffith, a welterweight and middleweight boxing champion who famously won 1962 bout in which his opponent Benny Paret died 10 days later, dies at age 75.

headline.main: Emile Griffith, Boxer Who Unleashed a Fatal Barrage, Dies at 75
headline.print_headline: Manhood Challenged, Boxer Unleashed a Fatal Barrage, and Lived With Regret

docs.snippet: Friends and family described George Sauer Jr., a former Jet who died in May, as a man who had a story to tell, but never got the chance to....
docs.lead_paragraph: Friends and family described George Sauer Jr., a former Jet who died in May, as a man who had a story to tell, but never got the chance to.
docs.abstract: Friends and family describe George Sauer Jr, former New York Jets wide receiver who died in May, as a man who had a story to tell, but never got the chance; Sauer remained a passionate writer throughout his life, striving to complete novel that never fully materialized.

headline.main: The Missing Pieces of an Untold Story About a Jet
headline.print_headline: Filling In the Missing Pieces of a Jet’s Untold Story
